title: IoT Smart Agriculture System
shortDescription: An IoT-based system to monitor soil moisture, temperature, and humidity for precision farming.
fullDescription: This project integrates sensors (soil moisture, temperature, humidity) with an ESP32 and sends real-time data to the cloud. Farmers can view insights on a mobile app and receive automated alerts for irrigation and crop health monitoring.

title: AI-Powered Attendance System
shortDescription: Face-recognition based smart attendance system for schools and offices.
fullDescription: Using OpenCV and a deep learning model, this project enables automatic attendance tracking through a camera. It reduces manual errors and integrates with cloud databases for record management and reporting.

title: Mini Vending Machine
shortDescription: A prototype vending machine that dispenses items based on IoT payments.
fullDescription: This project uses NodeMCU with servo motors and sensors to build a small vending machine. It supports cashless payments through mobile wallets and integrates with Firebase for tracking purchases and inventory.

title: Robotic Arm for Object Sorting
shortDescription: An automated robotic arm that sorts objects based on size and color.
fullDescription: This robotic arm uses multiple servo motors, a Raspberry Pi camera, and OpenCV to detect object characteristics. The system sorts items on a conveyor belt into separate bins, demonstrating automation in industries.

title: Smart Weather Station
shortDescription: A compact weather station to measure temperature, pressure, humidity, and rainfall.
fullDescription: Built using NodeMCU, DHT11, BMP180, and a rain sensor, this project collects weather parameters and uploads data to ThingSpeak. It also provides real-time alerts and graphical dashboards for analysis.
